languages.text: "Как ты мог?! Как?! Ты?! Мог?!" {n}Голос Инцендии наполняет треск пламени палаческого костра, но ярость прогорает до углей в одно мгновение, и тон ее падает до шелеста несомого ветром пепла.{/n} "Ты впал в ересь, Ксавьер. И я тебя обвиняю".

"How dare you! How DARE you!" {n}Incendia's voice roars like the fire of the executioner's furnace, but then her rage burns down to coals, her tone becoming more akin to the rustling of ashes being scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."
languages.original_text: "Как ты мог?! Как?! Ты?! Мог?!" {n}Голос Инцендии наполняет треск пламени палаческого костра, но ярость прогорает до углей в одно мгновение, и тон ее падает до шелеста несомого ветром пепла.{/n} "Ты впал в ересь, Ксавьер. И я тебя обвиняю".

traits.locale_text: "How could you?! How. Could. You?!" {n}Incendia's voice is cracking with the executioner's flames, but her rage burns to coals in one moment, and her tone drops to the sound of the ashes scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

"How could you?! How. Could. You?!" {n}Incendia's voice is cracking with the executioner's flames, but her rage burns to coals in one moment, and her tone drops to the sound of the ashes scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

"How dare you?! How. Dare. You." {n}Incendia's voice is crackling with the executioner's flames, but her rage burns to coals in one moment and her tone drops to the rustling sound of the ashes scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

"How dare you?! How. Dare. You." {n}Incendia's voice is crackling with the executioner's flames, but her rage burns to coals in one moment and her tone drops to the rustling sound of the ashes scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

"How dare you! How DARE you!" {n}Incendia's voice roars like the fire of the executioner's furnace, but then her rage burns down to coals, her tone becoming more akin to the rustling of ashes being scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

"How dare you! How DARE you!" {n}Incendia's voice roars like the fire of the executioner's furnace, but then her rage burns down to coals, her tone becoming more akin to the rustling of ashes being scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

languages.text: « Comment avez-vous osé ? COMMENT ? » {n}La voix d'Incendia rugit comme les flammes d'une fournaise, mais s'éteint rapidement et elle poursuit sur un ton qui n'évoque que le bruissement des cendres dispersées par le vent.{/n} « Vous avez sombré dans l'hérésie, Xavier, et je vous condamne. »
languages.original_text: "How dare you! How DARE you!" {n}Incendia's voice roars like the fire of the executioner's furnace, but then her rage burns down to coals, her tone becoming more akin to the rustling of ashes being scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

traits.locale_text: « Comment avez-vous osé ? COMMENT ? » {n}La voix d'Incendia claque comme le fouet d'un bourreau, mais sa rage retombe aussi vite et elle poursuit sur un ton qui n'évoque que le bruissement des cendres dispersées par le vent.{/n} « Vous avez sombré dans l'hérésie, Xavier, et je vous condamne. »

languages.text: «¡¿Cómo te atreves?! ¡¿Cómo te ATREVES?!». {n}La voz de Incendia ruge como las llamas del horno de un verdugo, pero después su furia se reduce a las brasas y adopta un tono más similar a las cenizas dispersadas por el viento.{/n} «Has caído en la herejía, Xavier. Y te sentencio por ello».
languages.original_text: "How dare you! How DARE you!" {n}Incendia's voice roars like the fire of the executioner's furnace, but then her rage burns down to coals, her tone becoming more akin to the rustling of ashes being scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

traits.locale_text: «¡¿Cómo osas?! ¿Cómo... osas...? {n}La voz de Incendia restalla con las llamas de la ejecutora, pero su furia se reduce a ascuas en un instante y su tono pasa a ser el susurro de las cenizas esparcidas a los vientos.{/n} «Has caído en la herejía, Xavier. Yo te condeno».

languages.text: “你好大的胆子！你！好大的胆子！”{n}因森蒂娅咆哮起来，声音中带着刽子手的烈焰。但随后，她的怒火瞬间凝成了煤渣，声音也降下了来，仿佛变成了随风而逝的灰烬。{/n}“你已经踏上了异端的道路，希维尔。我宣判你有罪。”
languages.original_text: "How dare you! How DARE you!" {n}Incendia's voice roars like the fire of the executioner's furnace, but then her rage burns down to coals, her tone becoming more akin to the rustling of ashes being scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

traits.locale_text: “你哪来的胆子？！真是胆大包天！”{n}因森蒂娅咆哮起来，仿佛带着刽子手的烈焰。但随后，她的怒火瞬间凝成了煤渣，声音也降下了来，仿佛变成了随风而逝的灰烬。{/n}“你已经踏上了异端的道路，希维尔。我宣判你有罪。”

languages.text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen? Wie KÖNNT Ihr es wagen?!" {n}Incendias Stimme brennt wie das Feuer im Ofen des Henkers, doch dann erkaltet ihr Zorn zu glühender Kohle und ihr Ton ähnelt er dem Rascheln von Asche, die vom Wind zerstreut wird.{/n} "Ihr seid zum Ketzer geworden, Xavier. Und ich verdamme Euch."
languages.original_text: "How dare you! How DARE you!" {n}Incendia's voice roars like the fire of the executioner's furnace, but then her rage burns down to coals, her tone becoming more akin to the rustling of ashes being scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

traits.locale_text: "Wie könnt Ihr es wagen?! Wie. Könnt. Ihr. Es. Wagen." {n}In Incendias Stimme knistern die Flammen des Henkers, doch ihr Zorn brennt in einem einzigen Augenblick zu Kohle nieder und ihr Ton verkommt zu dem Rascheln der Asche im Wind.{/n} "Ihr seid zum Ketzer geworden, Xavier. Und ich verdamme Euch."

languages.text: 「よくもそんなことを！よくも…よくも…よくも！」{n}インセンディアの声は処刑人の炉の炎のように轟く。しかし、彼女の怒りは一瞬にして燃え尽きて、その口調は風に散らされる灰のざわめきに落ちる。{/n}「ザビエル、お前は異端に落ちた。私がお前を粛清しよう」
languages.original_text: "How dare you! How DARE you!" {n}Incendia's voice roars like the fire of the executioner's furnace, but then her rage burns down to coals, her tone becoming more akin to the rustling of ashes being scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."

traits.locale_text: 「よくもそんなことを！よくも…よくも…よくも！」{n}インセンディアの声は処刑人の炉の炎のように轟く。しかし、彼女の怒りは一瞬にして燃え尽きて、その口調は風に散らされる灰のざわめきに落ちる。{/n}「ザビエル、お前は異端に落ちた。私がお前を粛清しよう」

languages.text: "Bu ne cesaret! BU NE CESARET!" {n}İncendia'nın sesi, celladın fırınındaki ateş gibi yükseliyor ama sonra öfkesi korlaşıyor; ses tonu, rüzgârda salınan küllerin hışırtısına benziyor.{/n} "Sen kâfirliğe teslim oldun Xavier. Seni kınıyorum."
languages.original_text: "How dare you! How DARE you!" {n}Incendia's voice roars like the fire of the executioner's furnace, but then her rage burns down to coals, her tone becoming more akin to the rustling of ashes being scattered by the wind.{/n} "You have fallen to heresy, Xavier. And I condemn you."
